meta.title: Home - Keeneyville Elementary School District 20

body.class: fsLiveMode fsHasHeader fsHasMenu fsHasFooter fsHasOneColumnLayout home fsHasTheme3

li.a: D20 Remote Learning Survey for Families
Request Student Paper Packet for Remote Learning
D20 Remote Learning Survey for Families
Request Student Paper Packet for Remote Learning

div.class: fsElement fsResourceElement fsSlideshow main-slideshow fsSlideshowHorizontal fsStatePlaying

h4.strong: REMOTE INSTRUCTION WILL CONTINUE FOR ALL DISTRICT 20 STUDENTS THROUGH 5/29/2020.
ALL DISTRICT 20 SCHOOL BUILDINGS ARE CLOSED DUE TO STATE MANDATE THROUGH END OF THE 2019-20 SCHOOL YEAR.

a.strong: FOR IMPORTANT HEALTH UPDATES ON CORONAVIRUS (COVID-19) CLICK HERE

div.h1: Ignite the power and potential of each student.

section.class: fsElement fsPostElement fsGrid news-panel fsThumbnailMedium fsItemCount_6

img.alt: KINDERGARTEN + PRESCHOOL REGISTRATION FOR NEXT YEAR IS OPEN!

div.a: KINDERGARTEN + PRESCHOOL REGISTRATION FOR NEXT YEAR IS OPEN!

div.p: WELCOME 2020-2021 KINDERGARTEN + PRESCHOOL FAMILIES! Thank you for helping us to plan ahead for an exciting year for your child! We have outlined a new process for "Virtual Kindergarten Registration" for you at https://www.esd20.org/registration. Please view the new procedures and help us to get your child ready to head to Keeneyville classrooms in the Fall!

Due to social distancing requirements and current health and safety concerns, we had to cancel the in-person Kindergarten Round-Up information sessions. But we encourage you to reach out to us if you have any questions via email to registration@esd20.org and let us know how we can help you.

article.a: Read More about KINDERGARTEN + PRESCHOOL REGISTRATION FOR NEXT YEAR IS OPEN!

div.p: Keeneyville School District 20 has decided to modify Student Enrollment procedures for the 2020-2021 School Year in light of the health and safety concerns The health and safety of our students, families, and staff remains a priority for us and we want to meet your needs, and the needs of our community.

We have outlined a procedure for this year only. We hope that the new process will meet your needs, and the needs of our community. It is important for us to plan ahead for the 2020-21 School Year and we are grateful for your help in getting your child ready for next school year!
GO TO https://www.esd20.org/registration TO SEE THE NEW D20 PROCESS.

p.em: If you have any questions or concerns regarding student enrollment in District 20, please email registration@esd20.org.

article.a: Read More about NEW Registration Procedures for 2020-2021

div.p: The School Calendar for 2020-2021 has been finalized and approved. To view/download:

ul.li: For Grades 1-8, the first day of school will be a half-day on Thursday, August 20th.

For Preschool (ECC), the first day of school is tentatively on Monday, August 24th, with pre-school screening on Thursday, August 20th and Friday, August 21st. (We are currently working to finalize the ECC calendar and will post as soon as it is approved.)
For Kindergarten, the first day of school will be a full day on Wednesday, August 26th. Pre-K Screenings will take place on Monday, August 24th and Tuesday, August 25th.

article.a: Read More about 2020-2021 School Calendar is READY!

a.title: Powered by Finalsite opens in a new window

div.h6: Visit new Family Support Resources page for tips + information to support social, emotional, and mental needs of your child and family.
Free Meals will still be available for pick-up on weekdays - D20 Weekly Meal Schedule
Virtual Parent Cafe on Keeping Your Child Safe Online: Internet Safety will be on Thurs., 5/14 6-7pm. Must register online by 5/11.

font.font: Thank you for your feedback on the

a.data-page-name: D20 Remote Learning Survey for Families

font.a: D20 Remote Learning Survey for Families

font.font: , which will remain open for additional responses. We will review and make modifications to the remote learning plan as needed as we move into May.

h6.span: FRIDAYS IN MAY, 5/8, 5/18, + 5/22 WILL BE CATCH-UP DAYS FOR STUDENTS, WITH NO REMOTE INSTRUCTION.

div.h6: Stay tuned for details on year-end events and getting items from lockers, desks, returning library books, etc.
JOIN IN THE ESD20 ABC COUNTDOWN TO SUMMER FOR FUN FAMILY ACTIVITIES!
